tidyr part of the tidyverse
  • Tidy data
  • Reference
  • News

Standard-evaluation version of unite

This is a S3 generic.

unite_(data, col, from, sep = "_", remove = TRUE)

Arguments

data

A data frame.
col

Name of new column as string.
from

Names of existing columns as character vector
sep

Separator to use between values.
remove

If TRUE, remove input columns from output data frame.

Contents

  • Arguments

tidyr is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.

Developed by Hadley Wickham.
